reviewText: I am about 50 pages into this book.  The material seems fine so far, well written and easy to understand.  However, upon opening the book to the center, the spine cracked.  Why bookmakers have lost any attention to quality is beyond me.  A book should hold up at least through the first reading.
title: Data Mining: Practical Machine Learning Tools and Techniques, Third Edition (The Morgan Kaufmann Series in Data Management Systems)
